title: Logitech G keys not being recognized by League of legends as of 5.5
body:
Might be keyboard specific but anyone with a Logitech keyboard and used the G keys for macros are the now unable to do so with 5.5 being rolled out? 

The only way im able to use them now is if i bind them to another key stroke. 

Anyone else with this issue? Or theirs works fine? Or know of a solutions?

Hoping that it gets fixed next patch

replies.body:
That's why I set my programmable keys to existing keys on my keyboard (like the numpad). This could be a possible quick fix if you fail to find another solution.

Have you updated your gaming software client recently?
yea im gettin the same problem now on my g700 gaming mouse hope it is fixed soon
